sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，測試，調節，清理和重做。

sentences.english: In turn, a thin drunk sleep the chill heavy.
sentences.chinese: 薄醉不成鄉，轉覺春寒重。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有隻箱子特別重，可誰也弄不清是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: Conclusion Heavy-moxibustion is a good method for constipation after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 結論重灸法是治療中風後便祕的良好方法。

sentences.english: Loop quantum gravity is in the jargon background independent.
sentences.chinese: 環圈量子重力學用行話來說，是“背景獨立”的。

sentences.english: A new scheme used in single-phase adaptive reclosure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種單相自適應重合閘的新方案。

sentences.english: The prisoner had on his feet fetters weighing fifty pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這犯人的腳上有一對五十斤重的鐵球。
那乾酪是重口味的《切達》。

sentences.english: The goods we packed in new and sound jute bags each containing about 200 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 貨物是用堅固的新麻袋包裝的，每袋約重200磅。

sentences.english: How heavy are you? I'm 48 kg.
An additional charge is made for heavy bags.
First of all, you don't get to do things over in my line of work.
sentences.chinese: 首先，作爲總統，我不能把事情重作一遍。

sentences.english: They are going to renew their contract.
There am a gush of blood as his wound re-opened.
sentences.chinese: 他的傷口重開時血流如注。

sentences.english: This elephant is five times weightier than that small tiger.
sentences.chinese: 這頭大象比那隻小老虎重五倍。

sentences.english: The heavy rare earth and Y also belong to immobile elements.
sentences.chinese: 重稀土元素及Y也屬於不活潑元素。
